title: A bill to establish the World War I Centennial Commission to ensure a suitable observance of the centennial of World War I, and for other purposes.
content: Establishes the World War I Centennial Commission to: (1) plan, develop, and execute programs, projects, and activities to commemorate the centennial of World War I. (2) encourage private organizations and state and local governments to organize and participate in such activities, (3) facilitate and coordinate such activities throughout the United States. And (4) serve as a clearinghouse for the collection and dissemination of information about centennial events and plans, and (5) develop commemoration recommendations for Congress and the President.
